results.title: Live Laugh Love Waterproof Vinyl Stickers Decal Print Sign
results.description:
Live Laugh Love Vinyl Sticker/Decal

The size is counted on the highest side of the sticker!

Vinyl sticker is made out of high-quality, removable vinyl that is easy to install and looks as if it's painted on.

Stick your vinyl decal on any smooth, clean, dry surface! All products are removable (but not reusable) and 100% mess-free. Decals will stick to almost any non-porous smooth surface such as painted walls, windows, glass, laptop, phone, cup, mirrors, tile, smooth metal, sealed wood and even vehicles such as cars, vans, RVТs motorcycles, ATVТs and boats.

VINYL MATERIAL: Each graphic is cut on High Gloss High Performance Cast Vinyl material rated for 8+ years outdoor or 10+ years indoor durability. The decal is heat-resistant and waterproof so they are capable of being hand-washed.

CUSTOM SIZE or COLOR: You may request a custom size decal or another vinyl color not listed. Just click on the УCustom OptionФ button.

APPLYING YOUR DECAL: Vinyl decals are easy to apply and easy to remove. They will not damage the surface to which they are applied. Any light residue left behind can be easily cleaned with alcohol or soap and water. All you have to do is peel and separate the application tape w/graphic from the liner-backing and apply to a clean surface with the supplied squeegee (if preferred). 

We will include easy-to-follow application instructions with your shipment.

PLEASE BE ADVISED: It is recommended to measure the area where the decal will be applied along with the decal size you are interested in to visually see how it will look on your favorite surface.

The following types of surfaces that may resist vinyl decals and may NOT work -- Medium to high textured walls or surfaces, low VOC, VOC FREE paints, stain resistant paints and paneling. Newly painted walls - Please wait at least a month before applying your decal.

Vinyl decal is removable but NOT reusable. All measurements are approximate.

results.title: Photo frame
results.description:
This unique photo frame was handmade using new and reclaimed materials. It could make the ideal present for that specail someone or a treat for yourself.

It is primarily white with wooden hearts, blue and gold glitter detailing and written in black letters "our family" (on the top of the frame and "live, love, laugh" on the bottom of the frame. Inside the frame is blue string, which is diagonal and crosses over other string (no background). The pegs where you would hang your photos on are adjustable (can move along the string). No hanging fitting is attatched but will be included to give you a choice wether you lean it on a table against a wall or hang it up.

results.title: LIVE LAUGH RUN Running Necklace  - Running Jewelry - Motivational Jewelry - Runner Charm with Gunmetal chain - Running Valentine - Run Life
results.description:
What a simple way to enjoy life!  Shout out your passion!  LIVE LAUGH RUN!  Love your running life!  Makes a great gift for anyone who is loving their training or someone who just needs a pick-me-up!  Great way to brighten up a runner's tough day!  

The LIVE LAUGH RUN 1 Piece Necklace features a 3/4 inch wide by 1 inch long hand hammered nickel silver pendant hand stamped with LIVE LAUGH RUN horizontally down the center.  Unless otherwise indicated, the LIVE LAUGH RUN necklace will arrive on an 18 inch gunmetal chain as shown.  Now with the option to add a Pewter Running Shoe!  


If you would like to add a Race Distance Pendant to your necklace, additional Pendants are available here:
http://www.etsy.com/shop/TheRunHome?section_id=10295659

If you would like a different chain size, just let me know!  Gunmetal chains are available in 16 inch, 18 inch, 20 inch or 22 inch at no additional charge. Please specify your chain length (16, 18, 20, or 22 inch) in the Message to Seller box on the Etsy Checkout Page. Unless otherwise indicated, your necklace will arrive on an 18 inch gunmetal chain.

Sterling Silver Chain is available as a Substitute for gunmetal chain on all items at The Run Home. If you would like to purchase a Sterling Silver Chain as a Substitute for the gunmetal chain on your necklace, please see the Sterling Silver Chain collection available here: 
http://www.etsy.com/shop/TheRunHome?section_id=10295659

Each necklace and pendant is hand crafted and hand stamped by me. There may be slight variations in diameter, letter stamping, alignment and coloring. Please consider these unique qualities to be a testament to the handmade nature of each piece. 

Every item from The Run Home comes in a stylish black jewelry box tied with a cute silver bow making it ready for gift giving. Your package will also arrive with no invoice inside.

The Run Home now offers a GIFT WRAP OPTION.  Please see our listings here: http://www.etsy.com/shop/TheRunHome?section_id=10295659

Please visit our shop at http://www.etsy.com/shop/TheRunHome for more items. Thanks for taking a look!

results.title: Welcome, we hope you like dog hair - Oversized Framed Sign 64x49cm
results.description:
Welcome, we hope you like dog hair
Oversized Framed and painted timber sign - Ivory White with Charcoal Black Text
64 x 49 x 4cm approximately. D ring and wire hanger included.
Oversized signs are made from engineered timber, to prevent the excessive warping that can occur with wide pine boards and then framed with stained timber.

Wood is perfectly imperfect and we make no effort to hide the beautiful character each piece has, so you will find most pieces have knots, cracks, dents, creases and scuffs etc naturally on them and no two can be exactly the same! 
The back is left as bare timber (your wall won't mind 😉).

FINE PRINT:
These are made for indoor use. Outdoor use may result in some damage to the paint and or timber.
Item will be sent to address supplied to us by etsy (please make sure it is correct). 
All custom orders are non refundable, we will endeavor to give you exactly what you are after, are therefore communication is very important.
Due to different computer monitor settings, some colours may look different than actual colour. Please allow for slight variations, depending on your current settings.

SHIPPING:
Will be posted with Australia Post Standard Postage, including tracking, signature on delivery and extra cover. 

♥Please don't hesitate to contact me! I am here to help and want you to be 100% happy with your purchase.
♥ Keep up to date with us at https://www.instagram.com/ourrusticroots
materials: Professional Picture Hanging D Rings and Wire

results.title: Live Love Laugh And All Of That Sublimation Transfer, RTS Image Transfer - Ready to Press Transfer - Full Color - Ready To Press 80
results.description:
Live Love Laugh and All of That Sublimation Transfer, RTS Image Transfer - Ready to Press Transfer - Full Color - Ready To Press 80

FREE SHIPPING WITH OVER $35 PURCHASE

**This is a sublimation transfer ONLY. You will receive a sublimation transfer of the image on the shirt. This is NOT  a digital file and you will NOT receive a shirt**


SUBLIMATION TRANSFER NEED TO KNOW:
* These transfers will not print white ink. If there is white in the design it will become the color of the fabric your apply it to.
* Each transfer has a ONE time use.
* Image color may very slightly due to screen solution 
* Transfer must be used on a substrate coated for sublimation (mugs, tumblers, glass etc.)
* Sublimation prints should be used on at least a 50% polyester count garment that is white or light colored. The closer to 100% polyester you get, the brighter the image. The closer to 50% polyester you get, the more vintage the image.
* Sublimation will NOT work on cotton or dark colored shirts
* You MUST apply sublimation transfer with a heat press. They can not be applied with an iron or a Cricut Easy Press.

**DON'T HAVE A HEAT PRESS AND WANT THE ACTUAL SHIRT MADE FOR YOU? SEND ME A MESSAGE FOR A PRIVATE LISTING**


SIZE OPTIONS - 
Koozie - 3" longest side
Pocket - 4" longest side
Infant - 4.5-5" longest side
Toddler - 5.5 - 6" longest side
Youth- 7.5"-8" longest side
Adult - 11" longest side
Adult Plus - 13" longest side
Mouse Pad - 9" on longest side
Pillow Case - 12.5" on longest side
Door Mat - 18.5" longest side
11 oz. mug - 3.5"x9.2"
15 oz. mug - 4.00"x9.5"

**DON'T HAVE A HEAT PRESS AND WANT THE ACTUAL SHIRT MADE FOR YOU? SEND ME A MESSAGE FOR A PRIVATE LISTING**

Turn around time 1-3 business days


*DUE TO THE NATURE OF THIS ITEM WE DO NOT ACCEPT REFUNDS, RETURNS OR EXCHANGES.

*Application instructions will be included 

*Shipped with tracking in hard rigid mailer for protection

results.title: Live Laugh Love Wall Decal, Live every moment Laugh every day Love beyond words decal for the wall sticker home decor vinyl lettering BC842
results.description:
Live every moment Laugh every day Love beyond words wall sticker decal for the home decor vinyl lettering

---------------------
HOW TO ORDER
---------------------

1. Pick a size. 
Dimensions listed are height x width (in inches). These dimensions are the overall size of the decal from the highest point to the lowest point in the design. 
Please keep in mind, if you'd like different size options we can get you any size you'd like. Just let us know under the ASK A QUESTION tab.

2. Select your preferred color. 
This wall decal has many color option. See photo above for available colors. This listing is for Oracal 651 indoor matte vinyl. If you would like a stickier, outdoor material we have that too. Just let us know. 

*IMAGES DISPLAYED ARE FOR REFERENCE ONLY AND MAY NOT REFLECT EXACT SIZE AND/OR COLOR.

--------------------------------
SHIPPING AND RETURNS
--------------------------------

Processing takes approximately 2-3 days (however, we are generally even faster). 

We want you to be happy with your purchase. If you are having difficulty with installing please let us know. We want to help. There are several tricks we may be able to give to make it easier on your end. If you are not happy with the product itself, we do offer refunds on non-custom cuts (minus the shipping charges. Keep in mind, there may be a 20% restocking fee). Returns must be in original, unused condition. 

-------------------
INSTALLATION
-------------------

We have these way cute, cheesy installation videos you can watch here: http://installationvideos.com 
Richerd addresses every install issue we have ever run across and how to address them. Also, we are always an email away if you have any issues. 

Dust your wall, DO NOT wash with chemicals as this could leave a film on your wall. Soapy water is ok if you feel in is needed. Decals must be applied to a smooth, flat, clean, and dry surface (such as walls, windows, tile, mirrors, doors, etc.). Textured wall do affect install. We are yet to find a wall we haven't gotten to work. Some just require a little more elbow grease (as Richerd shows in his video titled "Tough Vinyl Lettering Install." 

Vinyl is a removable product. We use Oracal 631 which is the best on the market at this time. Some say it isn't as good as what they have received in the past. All I have to say to them is wait until you go to remove your super sticky decal that went on way easy. Not all vinyl is equal. We sell that super sticky vinyl as well. It's meant for outdoor signs. And I'd be happy to sell it to you just note it may pull off your paint and possibly your sheetrock as well when you go to remove it.

-----------------------
CUSTOM ORDERS
-----------------------

Custom orders are our specialty here at Vinyl 4 Decor. We sell more custom than anything by far. The possibilities are endless. Select ASK A QUESTION to the right of your screen under the listing info and let us know what we can help you with. We can get you a bid as well as a proof right away.
 Also, we have been in business for going on 10 years with several retail locations. We've created 1000's of designs over the years so if you have a saying you love, chances are we already have it in our system. We'd love to send you options. Just send us the quote. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
Thank you so much for looking!! Hope to hear from you.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

results.title: Wall Decal Quote - Live Laugh Love Sticker | Wall Sticker Quote | Wall Words Saying
results.description:
Live Laugh Love wall sticker quote with butterfly design

SIZES
All sizes are customizable. 
Larger sizes will come in separate pieces to make it easier to install.

FIXATE WALL STICKER DESIGNS
Can't find exactly what you want, or just need something no one else has? Your at the right place! As a graphic designer, I personally design each wall decal myself. I love creating and designing modern art that is unique and individual.

WHY FIXATE DESIGNS
All my wall decals are made from a matte vinyl like material which closely mimics a painted design. Every design is individually 'cut' out, NOT printed like other cheaper imitations which leave a shiny clear film between letters and designs. All our wall decals are fully removable which means that if you ever want to redecorate you can peel it off without damaging your surfaces..

INCLUDED IN PACKAGE
1x Design
1x Transfer Film (for easy application)
1x Instructions
1x Practice Decal 

Have any problems? Feel free to contact me and I will be happy to help.
